songs.title: Soul Glo
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Beautfiul, sexy
Easy as one, two, three
(Oh-ooh!)
Just let your soul glo
Just let it shine through
I want you to put your hands together
Just let your soul glo
And walk into the stage, big round of applause
Just let it shine through (Oh-oh)
Just let it shine through
For you, for you
Just let your soul glo
Good and terrible
Thank you

[Chorus]
Let it shine, let it, let it shine
Let it shine, let it, let it shine, yeah
Let it shine, let it, let it shine
Which one of y'all gon' shine?
Let it shine, let it, let it shine, shine

[Interlude]
I'd like to give a big round of applause to my band Sexual Chocolate
(Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
Sexual Chocolate, Sexual Chocolate
(Let it, let it)
Se-Se-Sexual Chocolate, Se-Se
(Let it, let it, let it)
My band, Sexual Chocolate
(Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
Sexual Chocolate, Sexual Chocolate
(Let it, let it)
Se-Se-Sexual Chocolate, Se-Se-Sexual Chocolate
(Let it, let it)
On God

[Verse 1]
Niggas be hurt for life, hoes be hurt from life, niggas be hurt
She don't dyke for real, she just hate niggas for life
Hurt people hurt people, can't you see, she's your queen to be?
Modern programs from the projects, it's a project to stop your progress (Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
To keep you obsessed with fancy objects, to crack your third eye it's a process (Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
It's a hot mess out here for a melanated nigga
I stay meditating, nigga (It's a nigga hurtin' me, bands)

[Chorus]
Let it shine, let it, let it shine (Oh-oh)
Let it shine, let it, let it shine (I say let it)
Which one of y'all gon' shine? (And me, and me)
Let it shine, let it, let it shine (Shine, shine, shine)
Let it shine let it, let it shine (Shine, shine, shine, and me, and you)
Let it shine, let it, let it shine
(It's a melanated, melanated, melanated, melanated)
Let it shine, let it, let it shine
(Melanated, melanated, melanated, melanated)
Let it shine let it, let it shine
(Melanated, melanated, I feel it all over my bones, in my body, in my penny and my third eye, oh, it's melanated in the sky)

[Interlude]
I'd like to give a big round of applause to my band Sexual Chocolate (Oh)
(Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
Sexual Chocolate, Sexual Chocolate
(Let it, let it)
Se-Se-Sexual Chocolate (Oh), Se-Se
(Let it, let it, let it)
My band, Sexual Chocolate
(Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
Sexual Chocolate, Sexual Chocolate (Oh)
(Let it, let it)
Se-Se-Sexual Chocolate, Se-Se-Sexual Chocolate (Oh)
(Let it, let it)
On God

[Verse 2]
Damn homie, I invoke the dead homies on the other side (Oh-oh)
To bring this shit back alive, back alive (Oh-oh)
Ali-i-i-i-i-i-i-i-ive
No one really di-i-i-i-i-i-i-i-i-ies
You-You-You sound hurt, all you do is complain
You the face of the "niggas ain't shit" campaign (Oh-oh)
Seven circuits in your brain, you addicted to pain (Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
Addicted to the chemicals that get released in your veins (Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
Just let your soul glow

[Chorus]
Let it shine, let it, let it shine (Oh)
Let it shine, let it, let it shine (I say the light comin' through)
Like which one of y'all gon' shine? (Shine, shine, shine)
Let it shine, let it, let it shine (Shine, shine, shine)
Which one of y'all gon', wh-which one of y'all gon' shine?
Let it shine, let it, let it shine
Wh-Which one of y'all gon' shine? (Shine, shine, shine)
Let it shine, let it, let it shine
Let it shine let it, let it shine (Shine, shine, shine)
Let it shine, let it, let it shine (Shine, shine, shine)
Like which one of y'all gon' shine? (Shine, shine, shine)
Let it shine, let it, let it shine
While you're in the clapping mood, clap-clap-clapping
(Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
Clapping, clapping, clap-clap-clapping mood
(Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
Clap
While you're in the clapping mood, clap-clap-clapping
(Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
If you feel it in your soul make it clap
Clapping, clapping, clap-clap-clapping mood
All my ladies, all my ladies make it clap
(Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
While you're in the clapping mood, clap-clap-clapping
(Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
If you feel it in your soul make it clap
Clapping, clapping, clap-clap-clapping mood
All my ladies, all my ladies make it clap
(Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
Make it clap, clap, clap, clap
And you, and you, and you
(Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
I want you to put your hands together
(Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
And walk into the stage, big round of applause
(Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
Big round of applause, big round of applause
(Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
R.I.P
(Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
Big round of applause for all the homies that ain't here right now
Big round of applause, big round of applause
R.I.P
(Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
Big round of applause for all the souls on the other side
R.I.P, R.I.P
(Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
R.I.P. Mac Miller
R.I.P., R.I.P
(Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
R.I.P. Nipsey Hussle
R.I.P., R.I.P. (Oh)
Good and terrible
(Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
R.I.P., R.I.P
(Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
R.I.P., R.I.P
Brother Bobby Hemmitt, yea
R.I.P., R.I.P
Bankroll Fresh
(Let it, let it, let it, let it, let it)
R.I.P., R.I.P
